coda_portique.summary: Development of an autonomous gateway equipped with cameras and a screen, enabling real-time detection of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) worn by users through an embedded AI model:
coda_portique.description_1: Training a YOLO-based AI model for detecting PPE (helmet, vest, etc.)
coda_portique.description_2: Integrating the AI model into a physical gateway: real-time video processing using cameras and AI
coda_portique.description_3: Developing an API ensuring communication between the AI and the interface that clearly displays detected and missing PPE on the screen
coda_portique.description_4: Setting up a database for history logging and tracking entries

c2t.summary: Development of a software solution for analyzing ultra-high-speed videos (1000 fps):
c2t.description_1: Recording videos with precise control of camera parameters (resolution, fps, video duration, etc.)
c2t.description_2: Optimized playback of recorded videos with frame-by-frame processing for highly detailed analysis, impossible with conventional video players
c2t.description_3: Development of drawing and object tracking tools directly on the videos

qarnot.summary: Redesign of the internal data management website:
qarnot.description_1: Creation of Vue.js pages and components (front-end), development of the Node.js API (back-end), and management of Sequelize models and the database
qarnot.description_2: Design and improvement of UI components (cards, lists, forms) to enhance usability
qarnot.description_3: Bug fixing and refactoring of existing components
qarnot.description_4: Team collaboration: GitLab code reviews, Jira ticket tracking, contribution to technical documentation

stage_edf.description_1: Design of a multi-agent simulation tool to study the impact of socio-economic factors (salary, location, etc.) on households’ adoption of EDF offers

stage_li_parad.description_1: Development of Machine Learning models to predict and detect hard drives likely to fail based on characteristics such as manufacturer, available capacity, number of reads/writes, and more

items.title: JLPT Explorer
items.description: Website to learn Japanese (currently unavailable). Full-stack application: front-end in React and REST API via Node.js connected to a MongoDB database.

items.title: My Portfolio Website
items.description: The website you are currently on. Developed with React.
